Text: The Columbia Distribution Cos Capacity Avail for Release November Attached is the Columbia Distribution Companies summary of capacity available for release for the month of November Please note that bids are due on Monday October th at pm EST If you have any questions please contact any of the representatives listed at the bottom of the release summary Thanks Aaron Goddard See attached file FirstReleaseNovdoc FirstReleaseNovdoc
